Artist Tips

Color Theory

Pretty Rainbows

  • Remember when choosing colors for layouts, less is more.
  • Complimentary colors work best.
  • Makre sure colors match the mood you are trying to convey.

Patterns

Texture Time

  • Patterns can add to the mood of a layout.
  • Putting stripes with polka dots is the biggest cardinal sin.
  • Using these as a highlight can be more impactful than taking up the entire page.

Typography

Words speak louder

  • Font size always matters.
  • Yes, typing in all caps is considered both yelling and spammy.
  • Google Fonts is your best friend!

Animation

Cartoon Time

  • As a graphic artist, somewhere in all of my projects, I like to place shameless plugs.
  • Timing can make or break an animation sequence.
  • Motion tween is for the lazy! (But often times, it's also very useful).

Negative Space

Social... I mean item distancing

  • To avoid cluttered layout, make sure you have a good balance of negative (empty) space.
  • No, it has nothing to do with being a Negative Nicko.
  • Yes, I wish it gave me the power to go into outer space.
